title: Dear Waltz
sinopse: After her mother's death, high schooler Mi-Hyang packs up her belongings and enters the household of her mother's formal manager. Even though she was a daughter of a rich man, with her father and other family members still alive and well, she apparently has good reasons for doing this... So the life of smiling 24/7 Mi-Hyang and the two good-looking sons of her mother's formal manager—with their own set of unique personalities—begins!!
